Package com.tabuto.jsimlife.actions

Class Summary
AddCellAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Open the JSLNeeCellView
AddSeedAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Open a Dialog to add some food into simulation
ChangeColorButtonAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Open a JColorChooser to set background color of a button
CreateNewSeedAction Class uses from JSLNewSeedView in order to add some seed into the Game
CreateNewZlifeAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: get the JSLNewCellView selected parameters to create the right Zlife number
ExitSimulationAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Quit the game
LaunchXMLEasyEditorAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Launch thirdly party software XMLEasyEditor
LoadDnaAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Loading a DNA's XML file into JSLNewCellView using JFileChooser
LoadSimulationAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Loading a JSimLife game file into Simulation
MarkZlifeAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Mark the selected Zlife
NewSimulationAction  
PauseSimulationAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Stop the simulation drawing
RefreshStatisticAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Uses the JSLStatistic.calculateStatistics() method to update statistical data.
ResetSimulationAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Clear all sprite group and reset game
SaveAsSimulationAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Save the JSimLife game file into file
SaveDnaAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Save the DNA into an XML file using the default preferences path
SavePreferencesAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Save the current preferences into an XML file
SaveSelectedZLifeAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Save the selected Zlife's Dna into an XML file using a JFileChooser
SaveSimulationAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Save a previously saved JSimLife game file into file
SetPreferencesAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Open new JSLPreferencesView
ShowAboutInfoAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Open a new JSLAboutView
ShowChartViewAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Open a new JSLChartsView
ShowTestTubeAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following action: Open a new JSLTestTubeView
StartSimulationAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Reset the current simulation by clear the Sprite Group into JSimLife game
StepSimulationAction Class extends AbstractAction to perform the following Action: Drawing a single step movement into simulation
